title: Report
body:
Report¶

Note

Report displays a list of all the expenses being reported.

The expenses are listed by date, and each expense displays other elements such as type, user, and description.

  1. Click the <i class=”fa fa-bars”></i> menu icon in the ribbon

  2. Click Finance

  3. Click Expenses

  4. Click Report

  5. Click on the expense to view receipt upload, elements, audit trail, and comments

  6. Click Download or Export to download or print image of the expense receipt

  7. To change status:

    • Click the <i class=”fa fa-ellipsis-v”></i> ellipsis icon in the top right hand corner of the page

    • Click Change Status

    • Click the current status

    • Click the desired status

    • Click the <i class=”fa fa-angle-left”></i> back arrow

    • Click Save

  8. If desired, leave a comment

  9. If desired, hide a certain element by clicking the <i class=”fa fa-angle-down”></i> arrow icon*, then clicking on the element

  10. If desired, export reports

    • To export one expense or a select few, click the <i class=”fa fa-circle-thin”></i> circle icon to the left of the row for each item

    • Click the pop-up tab entitled Export X item(s)

    • Click Yes

    • Select date to create batch

    • Click Save

  11. If desired, edit expenses
